weapon.name: Hammer of Unity
weapon.description:
If I had a hammer / I'd hammer in the morning /

I'd hammer in the evening...all over this land/

I'd hammer out danger / I'd hammer out a warning /
I'd hammer out love between all of my brothers and my sisters /
All over this land.

OTHER.Notes: The bit of the description that was missing was found here: http://forums2.battleon.com/f/tm.asp?m=1109287
